price: Moses said, “If I ask you about anything after this, do not keep me in your company, for then you would be excused concerning me.”
arabic: قَالَ إِن سَأَلۡتُكَ عَن شَيۡءِۭ بَعۡدَهَا فَلَا تُصَٰحِبۡنِيۖ قَدۡ بَلَغۡتَ مِن لَّدُنِّي عُذۡرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
